item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: --- title: "Hello R Markdown" author: "Frida Gomam" date: 2015-07-23T21:13:14-05:00 categories: ["R"] tags: ["R Markdown", "plot", "regression"] --- R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.
